00018 #include <boost/config.hpp>   // for broken compiler workarounds
00019 
00020 #if defined(BOOST_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATES) && !defined(BOOST_MSVC6_MEMBER_TEMPLATES)
00021 #include <boost/detail/shared_array_nmt.hpp>
00022 #else
00023 
00024 #include <boost/assert.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/checked_delete.hpp>
00026 
00027 #include <boost/detail/shared_count.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/detail/workaround.hpp>
00029 
00030 #include <cstddef>            // for std::ptrdiff_t
00031 #include <algorithm>          // for std::swap
00032 #include <functional>         // for std::less
00033 
00034 namespace boost
00035 {
00036 
00037 //
00038 //  shared_array
00039 //
00040 //  shared_array extends shared_ptr to arrays.
00041 //  The array pointed to is deleted when the last shared_array pointing to it
00042 //  is destroyed or reset.
00043 //
00044 
00045 template<class T> class shared_array
00046 {
00047 private:
00048 
00049     // Borland 5.5.1 specific workarounds
00050     typedef checked_array_deleter<T> deleter;
00051     typedef shared_array<T> this_type;
00052 
00053 public:
00054 
00055     typedef T element_type;
00056 
00057     explicit shared_array(T * p = 0): px(p), pn(p, deleter())
00058     {
00059     }
00060 
00061     //
00062     // Requirements: D's copy constructor must not throw
00063     //
00064     // shared_array will release p by calling d(p)
00065     //
00066 
00067     template<class D> shared_array(T * p, D d): px(p), pn(p, d)
00068     {
00069     }
00070 
00071 //  generated copy constructor, assignment, destructor are fine
00072 
00073     void reset(T * p = 0)
00074     {
00075         BOOST_ASSERT(p == 0 || p != px);
00076         this_type(p).swap(*this);
00077     }
00078 
00079     template <class D> void reset(T * p, D d)
00080     {
00081         this_type(p, d).swap(*this);
00082     }
00083 
00084     T & operator[] (std::ptrdiff_t i) const // never throws
00085     {
00086         BOOST_ASSERT(px != 0);
00087         BOOST_ASSERT(i >= 0);
00088         return px[i];
00089     }
00090     
00091     T * get() const // never throws
00092     {
00093         return px;
00094     }
00095 
00096     // implicit conversion to "bool"
00097 
00098 #if defined(__SUNPRO_CC) && BOOST_WORKAROUND(__SUNPRO_CC, <= 0x530)
00099 
00100     operator bool () const
00101     {
00102         return px != 0;
00103     }
00104 
00105 #elif defined(__MWERKS__) && BOOST_WORKAROUND(__MWERKS__, BOOST_TESTED_AT(0x3003))
00106     typedef T * (this_type::*unspecified_bool_type)() const;
00107     
00108     operator unspecified_bool_type() const // never throws
00109     {
00110         return px == 0? 0: &this_type::get;
00111     }
00112 
00113 #else 
00114 
00115     typedef T * this_type::*unspecified_bool_type;
00116 
00117     operator unspecified_bool_type() const // never throws
00118     {
00119         return px == 0? 0: &this_type::px;
00120     }
00121 
00122 #endif
00123 
00124     bool operator! () const // never throws
00125     {
00126         return px == 0;
00127     }
00128 
00129     bool unique() const // never throws
00130     {
00131         return pn.unique();
00132     }
00133 
00134     long use_count() const // never throws
00135     {
00136         return pn.use_count();
00137     }
00138 
00139     void swap(shared_array<T> & other) // never throws
00140     {
00141         std::swap(px, other.px);
00142         pn.swap(other.pn);
00143     }
00144 
00145 private:
00146 
00147     T * px;                     // contained pointer
00148     detail::shared_count pn;    // reference counter
00149 
00150 };  // shared_array
00151 
00152 template<class T> inline bool operator==(shared_array<T> const & a, shared_array<T> const & b) // never throws
00153 {
00154     return a.get() == b.get();
00155 }
00156 
00157 template<class T> inline bool operator!=(shared_array<T> const & a, shared_array<T> const & b) // never throws
00158 {
00159     return a.get() != b.get();
00160 }
00161 
00162 template<class T> inline bool operator<(shared_array<T> const & a, shared_array<T> const & b) // never throws
00163 {
00164     return std::less<T*>()(a.get(), b.get());
00165 }
00166 
00167 template<class T> void swap(shared_array<T> & a, shared_array<T> & b) // never throws
00168 {
00169     a.swap(b);
00170 }
00171 
00172 } // namespace boost
00173 
00174 #endif  // #if defined(BOOST_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATES) && !defined(BOOST_MSVC6_MEMBER_TEMPLATES)
00175 
00176 #endif  // #ifndef BOOST_SHARED_ARRAY_HPP_INCLUDED
